[<Microsoft.Build.Framework.RequiredRuntime("v2.0")>]

summary.span: 这个类定义了“GenerateResource”MSBuild 任务，该任务可以使用资源 API 来转换资源文件。

span.span: This class defines the "GenerateResource" MSBuild task, which enables using resource APIs to transform resource files.

comment.span: 请参阅 GenerateResource.cs for the source code to the GenerateResource task;此文件仅包含嵌套内部 Resgen.exe 任务

span.span: See GenerateResource.cs for the source code to the GenerateResource task; this file just contains the nested internal ResGen task

summary.span: 此任务完成的依赖项检查的其他输入。

span.span: Additional inputs to the dependency checking done by this task.

summary.span: 例如，项目和目标通常应该为输入，以便在对它们进行更新时，所有资源都重新生成。

span.span: For example, the project and targets files typically should be inputs, so that if they are updated, all resources are regenerated.

value.span: GenerateResource任务执行的依赖项检查的其他输入。

span.span: The additional inputs for the dependency checking that the GenerateResource task performs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，项目和目标文件应为输入，以确保在更新时，所有资源都将重新生成。For example, the project and targets files should be inputs to ensure that if they are updated all resources are regenerated.

summary.span: （默认值 = false）如果为 true，则始终创建一个新的 AppDomain 来计算 .resx 文件。

span.span: (default = false) When true, a new AppDomain is always created to evaluate the .resx files.

summary.span: 如果为 false，则只有当用户的程序集看起来像被 .resx 引用时，才会创建新的 AppDomain。

span.span: When false, a new AppDomain is created only when it looks like a user's assembly is referenced by the .resx.

value.span: 如果 GenerateResource 任务应创建一个新的 以评估 ( .resx) 文件，则为; 如果 GenerateResource 任务 只应在资源 ( .resx) 文件引用用户的程序集时创建新的。

span.span: if the GenerateResource task should create a new to evaluate the resources (.resx) files; if the GenerateResource task should create a new only when the resources (.resx) files reference a user's assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`.

summary.span: 要创建的资源文件的名称。

span.span: The name(s) of the resource file to create.

summary.span: 如果用户未指定此属性，任务将为每个输入文件名参数附加一个 .resources 扩展名，并将文件写入包含输入文件的目录。

span.span: If the user does not specify this attribute, the task will append a .resources extension to each input filename argument and write the file to the directory that contains the input file.

summary.span: 包括任何已更新的输出文件，但不包括由于错误而未能写入的任何输出文件。

span.span: Includes any output files that were already up to date, but not any output files that failed to be written due to an error.

value.span: 生成的文件（如 .resources 文件）的名称。

span.span: The name of the generated files, such as .resources files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不指定名称，则会使用匹配输入文件的名称，且创建的 .resources 文件会放在包含此输入文件的目录之中。If you do not specify a name, the name of the matching input file is used and the .resources file that is created is placed in the directory that contains the input file.

summary.span: 为强类型资源解析 ResX 文件（XML 资源）中的类型

span.span: Resolves types in ResX files (XML resources) for Strongly Typed Resources

value.span: 要从中加载 .resx 文件中的类型的引用。

span.span: The references to load types in .resx files from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Resx 文件数据元素可能具有 .NET 类型。Resx file data elements may have a .NET type. 读取 .resx 文件时，必须对此进行解析。When the .resx file is read, this must be resolved. 通常，使用标准类型加载规则可成功解析。Typically, it is resolved successfully by using standard type loading rules. 如果在 中提供程序集，则它们具有优先级。If you provide assemblies in , they take precedence. 强类型资源不要求此参数。This parameter is not required for strongly typed resources.

summary.span: 即使生成资源任务将在进程中进行处理，也将会生成日志消息。

span.span: Even though the generate resource task will do the processing in process, a logging message is still generated.

summary.span: 此日志消息将包含 Windows SDK 的路径。

span.span: This logging message will include the path to the windows SDK.

summary.span: 由于目标此时将在 Windows SDK 路径中传递，因此我们将使用它来进行日志记录。

span.span: Since the targets now will pass in the Windows SDK path we should use this for logging.

summary.span: 要转换的项的名称。

span.span: The names of the items to be converted.

summary.span: 扩展名必须是以下其中一项：.txt、.resx 或 .resources。

span.span: The extension must be one of the following: .txt, .resx or .resources.

value.span: 要转换的项。

span.span: The items to convert.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递到此参数的项必须具有以下文件扩展名之一：Items passed to this parameter must have one of the following file extensions: - `.txt`：指定要转换的文本文件的扩展名。`.txt`: Specifies the extension for a text file to convert. 文本文件只能包含字符串资源。Text files can only contain string resources. - `.resx`：指定要转换的基于 XML 的资源文件的扩展名。`.resx`: Specifies the extension for an XML-based resource file to convert. - `.restext`：指定相同的格式为 .txt。`.restext`: Specifies the same format as .txt. 如果要在生成过程中明确区分包含资源的源文件与其他源文件，则这个不相同的扩展名非常有用。This different extension is useful if you want to clearly distinguish source files that contain resources from other source files in your build process. `.resources`：指定要转换的资源文件的扩展名。`.resources`: Specifies the extension for a resource file to convert.

summary.span: 在为强类型资源生成类源时要使用的语言。

span.span: The language to use when generating the class source for the strongly typed resource.

summary.span: 此参数必须与 CodeDomProvider 所使用的其中一种语言完全匹配。

span.span: This parameter must match exactly one of the languages used by the CodeDomProvider.

value.span: 在为强类型资源生成类源时要使用的语言。

span.span: The language to use when generating the class source for the strongly typed resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性必须与 CodeDomProvider 使用的一种语言完全匹配。This property must match exactly one of the languages used by the CodeDomProvider. 例如 `VB` 或 `C#`。For example: `VB` or `C#`. 通过将值传递给此参数来指示任务生成强类型资源。By passing a value to this parameter, you instruct the task to generate strongly typed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此属性，则任何强类型资源都在全局命名空间中。If this property is not specified, any strongly typed resources are in the global namespace.

summary.span: 包含 FileTracker.dll 的相应 .NET Framework 位置的路径。

span.span: Path to the appropriate .NET Framework location that contains FileTracker.dll.

summary.span: 如果设置此参数，则用户应负责确保其传递的 FileTracker.dll 的位数与其要使用的 ResGen.exe 的位数相匹配。

span.span: If set, the user takes responsibility for making sure that the bitness of the FileTracker.dll that they pass matches the bitness of the ResGen.exe that they intend to use.

summary.span: 如果未设置，则任务会基于当前的 .NET Framework 版本决定合适的位置。

span.span: If not set, the task decides the appropriate location based on the current .NET Framework version.

value.span: 返回 。

span.span: Returns .

comments.span: 只应在部分或全部选中的工具集方案中使用。

span.span: Should only need to be used in partial or full checked in toolset scenarios.
